description:
Serving those in Albuquerque, New Mexico, in all matters related to business law, Business Law Southwest, LLC, focuses on business planning solutions that make sense. A proud member of LawPact, a network and international association of independent business law firms, we take the time to learn from other organizations about how to best help our clients.

Our attorneys are highly qualified and knowledgeable in many areas of law, including business transactions and litigation, professional licensing and liability, intellectual property, employment law, entertainment law, hospitality law, real estate law, estate and probate law, and complex criminal defense. From simple transactions to complicated regulatory matters, our law firm handles cases in all local, state and federal courts, along with the United States Supreme Court.

Throughout Texas, Arizona and New Mexico, our law firm provides positive solutions for the businesses of our clients. Along with our representation in court, our clients rely on us for alternative dispute resolution such as mediation and arbitration. Before any service or representation is given, we listen to our clients and discuss their individual concerns and needs, including whether a contingent fee or a flat fee is best for their situation.

At Business Law Southwest, LLC, we have vast experience protecting Southwest businesses through planning and development well into transactions and dissolution of businesses down the road. Our attorneys are focused first on creating a strategy that makes sense for our clients.
